articles.author: Owen Walker, Stephen Morris
articles.title: Why UBS brought Sergio Ermotti back as chief executive - Financial Times
articles.description: Swiss bank bets its former boss will do a better job of integrating Credit Suisse than Ralph Hamers would have
articles.content:
The day after agreeing to rescue Credit Suisse in the most significant banking deal since the financial crisis, UBS chair Colm Kelleher called Sergio Ermotti to see if he wanted his old job back.

articles.title: Twitter to no longer only promote paid-for accounts after backlash - The Guardian
articles.description: Elon Musk says he ‘forgot to mention’ other users would be visible on ‘for you’ timeline as well
articles.content:
Twitter has reversed course on plans to limit presence on its for you timeline to paying users only, with Elon Musk claiming he forgot to mention that other users would be visible as well.
